quest: Hey, do you have a moment? I need some help.
Don't laugh, but I got the wrong Tumbleyarn while I was out.
Can you give me 3 Green Tumbleyarn?
accept: Sorry I'm so inept at my job. I'd get it myself, but I don't know if I could do it.
decline: I see... What should I do...
complete: Thanks, you really saved my tail here.
Hey Sword Cat? How do you do it? How do you deal with the pressure?
I know who I'm supposed to be, but I'm just not there...
Thanks Sword Cat. It means a lot to me.
